attributes.action: Charge members of the public for inappropriate use of 999 ambulances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many genuinely ill people and traumatically injured people wait longer and longer each day because the government does nothing to prevent ambulance timewasters. a simple charging system would put a stop to many of these wasters.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Charge members of the public for inappropriate use of 999 ambulances."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14713.asp

Prime Minister's Office
